name: NOBLE KNIGHT
description:
NOBLE KNIGHT is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. Kill different enemies with your powerful sword and protect the peaceful island! Climb the locations to complete the task and deal with the monsters that stand in your way, and beware of deadly traps.

The world was filled with enemies from the nearest islands, behind which stands the leader Diego. At his direction, gnomes and bandits settled and destroyed your island. After that, you have no choice but to take up arms and restore order.

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Various levels and tasks
- Good soundtrack
